component.name: createExpense
component.description: Create a new expense in Printavo account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: getExpense
component.description: Retrieve details of an expense identified by the provided expense ID.

component.name: listExpenses
component.description: Retrieve a list of expenses from Printavo account.

component.name: updateExpense
component.description: Update details of the expense identified by the provided expense ID.

component.name: deleteExpense
component.description: Delete the expense identified by the provided expense ID from Printavo account.
